name: Reinquarantination
description:
❂  Click icon on the bottom right to enter full screen mode / Esc key to exit full screen 

                ✫  Game may take a while to load sometimes, please wait and click. Thank you, enjoy!

                 

                 Karl the caterpillar has to go into isolation for his pupation days. 

                 He is excited starts out optimistic, but soon the days become
                 indistinguishable inside his chrysalis. 

                 His friends seem to behave weirdly too and with the distance, 
                 their relationship becomes more evident. Who are they really?
                 And who is Karl himself?

                 Join him on his way to reincarnation during  quarantine!

             

                 This Visual Novel was created in a time span of 7 days
                 during a Game Jam of  my college course.

                 The subject was Social Distancing. 

                 My idea is based on a real caterpillar that I happened
                 to find in an egg box. 

                 Named Karl.

                 

                 I got the inspiration for the story when I watched Karl change
                 into a chrysalis. It reminded me of our current situation
                 in this time of isolation and  made me think of the sentence
                 'Everyone  has to go through their changes alone'.

                 Illustrations were created by me. 

                 For more art, check out my Insta @setoils
